Name: Landmarks, 395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment, Brooklyn (C 260038 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 260038 ZMK (395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment) submitted by the NYC Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 16c, changing from a C6-4 District to a C6-12 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 2, Council District 35.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
